description: The Event Archetype - Essential properties that define an event
title: Event Schema

___updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___event_region.description: The general region where the event takes place.  Can be a US state, or a province, for instance.

___admission_price.description: Admission price in cents as an integer (whole number)

___tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record

___end_date.description: Date and time event ends in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___event_location.description: Name of location event e.g. Tom's Sports Bar

___organizer_name.description: Name of the individual or company that organized the event

___created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

___event_address.description:
To add multiple address lines, use 
. For example, 1234 Glücklichkeit Straße
Hinterhaus 5. Etage li.

___ticket_quantity.description: Amount of tickets available for the event

___start_date.description: Date and time event starts in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

____id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

___recurring.description: Does the event take places on multiple occasions?

___category.description: General category of the event, e.g. Music

___timezone.description: Timezone abbreviation e.g. GMT, EST, PST.

___event_logo.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the event logo of this event
